Samira Magroun (a mụrụ na 24 Jenụwarị 1987) bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri.
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ nwere mmasị ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma kpọtụrụ ya maka ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, mana ọ chọghị ya
Magroun gụrụ Bekee mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ na-ahụ maka ụgbọ elu ma Nouvel Air were ya n'ọrụ tupu ọ malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya.
Magroun malitere na azụmahịa ngosi na Dlilek Mlak, nsụgharị Tunisian nke Deal or No Deal, n'afọ 2007
Mgbe ihe ngosi ahụ kwụsịrị, Sami Fehri kpọtụrụ ya maka ihe nkiri ncha ọhụrụ ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ya, mana o nyeghị ya ọrụ dị mkpa na mbụ
Ọ tụrụ Fehri n'anya nke ọma maka arụmọrụ Magroun, a họpụtakwara ya maka ọrụ Syrine na Maktoub, nke malitere n'afọ 2008
Omume ya bụ nwanyị na-amaghị nke onye ọlụlụ ya, Elyes, na-achịkwa, Magroun kwuru na ụmụ agbọghọ dịka ya jupụtara na ọha mmadụ.
N'afọ 2010, Magroun pụtara na sitcom Garage Lekrik dịka Lobna, nwa agbọghọ hụrụ ihe onwunwe n'anya nke ya na Boulouna nwere mmekọrịta mgbagwoju anya, nke Lotfi Abdelli gosipụtara

Mgbe a na-enye ya ọrụ ahụ, ọ nabatara ya ozugbo n'ihi na ọ bụ ezigbo ohere na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ezigbo ndị na-ese ihe nkiri. N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, Magroun pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Siria Takht Charki nke Yam Mach'hadi dere ma Racha Chabartji duziri.
Magroun kwere onye na-agba bọọlụ Adel Chedli nkwa ọlụlụ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012. Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke site na Chedli, Koussay
Ha abụọ lụrụ di na nwunye afọ abụọ tupu ha agba alụkwaghịm. Na Mee afọ 2020, Magroun mụrụ nwa ya nke abụọ, nwa nwanyị Zayna.
